website_summaries.verdict: The Turtle Beach Elite Pro 2 is a fantastic wired gaming headset even if its SuperAmp accessory doesn't add much to the total package.
pros: Excellent sound quality with powerful bass

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed, I’ve returned them after 1 hours of use.
customer_reviews.text: Feel great. Look great. Now to the quality of sound. It’s not much different between a cheaper turtle beach headset. I plugged the headset via the Xbox as instructed however very quiet, not impressed. So had to avoid the amp and go via headset! Mine cracked a tad at times as well, not expected of a £200+ headset. Unfortunately I am returning them after 1 hour of use... Wouldn’t waste your money on them, I’ve now brought the previous elite version that is due to arrive, hopefully have better luck with these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jm Newbold

customer_reviews.title: A honest review they are good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Honestly dont see why everyone else is complaining these headphones sound brilliant and the sound is very clear, they are not the loudest but they are not quiet either would definitely recommend would put them on par with the 800x steath elite just wired my only complaint is the hub but the standard headphone adapter for the controllers works just as well but u wont have bluetooth but overall they work as intended and might not be the loudest but are not as bad as the other reviews make them out to be
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound but cons outweigh the pros
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was great , superhuman sound was very good in COD warzone. The headset was too heavy with a lack of movement in the size of the headset meant that it was too tight to my head. Where the headset clings back to you head was on the edge of my jaw giving me jaw ache almost instantly . For the cost of the headset I would have expected something more comfortable The microphone was constant grief , where other people could not hear me well despite the mic being practically in my mouth. Sometimes people could not hear me at all. The Bluetooth set up was a pain every time you go to play the game
customer_reviews.author: rossboss

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these Turtles
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money and buy the Astro A50. I had both headsets side by side and the turtle’s are complete garbage. Hard to hear anything very tinny, the wires are untidy and pointless as the Amp is garbage and doesn’t hardly do a thing. The Astro are like Dre beats nice deep bass and crystal clear sound. The only thing I would say is that if u play Pubg, turn the Dolby surround off.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Turtle beach elite pro 1 is better
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good quality headset, good bluetooth but the sounding is rubbish, you’d think it’s good at listening for footsteps online but it’s not, and also the headset volume is really quite with the AMP and the turtle beach app is just as worse as all the settings kept on resetting, but if the audio cable was plugged into the controller, the mic echoed a lot in game and chat. Overall this isn’t worth the money at all. Turtle beach elite pro tournament is much better
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend purchasing
customer_reviews.text: The headset is very comfortable and stylish but the audio is not amazingly great for the price they are about the same sound as the stealth 600
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Not wireless
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed was expecting wirefree/wireless headset to use with Xbox. Appeared heavy. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: helen

customer_reviews.title: Performance not worth £220
customer_reviews.text: The Amp is a faff and a mess of wires. Save yourself £130 and get the Altas.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Hair Day

customer_reviews.title: Ability to hear others approach in game
customer_reviews.text: I have turtle beach headphones previously but been impressed with these ones now. Using app allows you to set up the headphones to your preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Rae Morton

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Although setup and connection where very simple, and cosmetically it looks and feels fantastic the sound quality is very tinny, even with some of the boost options turned on this headset still falls short compared to cheaper models made by Turtle Beach.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, clear sound! Fast shipping, great product. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sharni

customer_reviews.title: Smh
customer_reviews.text: It never came Turtle beach I am disappointed at you . Been more loyal to your brand than my dad was to my mom .
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine today. Awesome headset. Feel super durable. Pros -super comfortable -sound awesome -mic sounds great, but I’m coming from 800x which had no boom mic -super amp is cool, app works great to adjust settings - I wear glasses so the pro spec glasses relief is awesome -Wish they were a tad bit louder(might be adjusted in future firmware update hopefully) this was fixed in update. Volume plenty loud enough now (9/23/20) Update: headphones broke at where ear cups connect to metal headband. Piece was made of plastic and cracked from taking on and off.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: My previous version of the Elite Pro version 1 disintegrated so I bought this version since I liked version 1 so much. Biggest complaint is that the mic does not move to the upwards position, I have to unplug it and plug it in every time I want to use it. Another problem is that your game audio usually echos on your mic, so if you are gaming or someone is talking to you, they are going to hear an echo.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Extreme!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they look, feel and sound. You ask why 4 stars? Because it does lack a bit of oomf with explosions and gun fire etc stuff of that nature. But holy cow do they sound good as long as the hub is being used through the app. Plus being able to play music into the headphones while playing games is a big plus to me. The music sound quality lacks nothing it is superior sound I am very happy. As long as the hub is used.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Trenton Jr

customer_reviews.title: Footsteps everywhere 👀
customer_reviews.text: I like turtle beach. The sound quality is great! I can hear every footstep coming at me. The cables are somewhat cumbersome, there’s no way to go wireless and hear the game audio either. The super amp is cool and really amplifies the sound. It’s comfy. Overall, I like them and wanted wired Bc I got tired of charging batteries in my X42’s. I’d buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Poore

customer_reviews.title: My Amp Box no Work!
customer_reviews.text: My super amp box wouldn’t power on at all! My girlfriend and I have the same exact ones, her works perfectly but my power box amp thing didn’t even turn on, “barely used” my ass. Hoping for them to fix this! Will let y’all know if they do
customer_reviews.author: Sir Robert The Brave

customer_reviews.title: An Upgrade That Feels Like a Downgrade
customer_reviews.text: I had the original Elite Pro and TAC from release up until purchasing these ones; I used it on Xbox, PS4, and PC religiously. While the actual headset is decent, the Bluetooth Super Amp and App is honestly a disappointment compared to the original TAC. I liked being able to do everything with the TAC itself, rather than needing to use my smartphone. And when I do use the Smartphone to set up different choices (e.g. First Person Shooter vs Movie) I’m finding that the sound just isn’t there as much for gaming purposes. Maybe I’m missing something but the footsteps, the directionality, the everything, just isn’t as crisp or clear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D. Bird

customer_reviews.title: ❤️💕❤️💕❤️💕🤗🤗🤗❤️💕❤️💕❤️💕
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my Xbox One, and for my PS4(With a adapters), is a beautiful looking Headset, performance is a 10, the sound is great, 7.1 I love it and yes I found a bump with the Bluetooth connectivity, but is not a big deal, every time, I go to settings, Bluetooth, and I tap on my device and I open the Turtle Beach app, and I’m ok... great product, tank you to the makers, I really Love it...!❤️💕❤️💕❤️💕🤗🤗🤗❤️💕❤️💕❤️💕
customer_reviews.author: JGKD

customer_reviews.title: Gift for mom’s of gaming teenagers!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these is unmatched. My son was frustrated that they weren’t plug in & play. Does take time to set up for use, read the directions & if those aren’t enough, go online. Can not update firmware from cellphone or tablet, at least I couldn’t. My son uses them wired, so I’m not sure of quality of sound using Bluetooth. However, he does live the crisp sound & I love that he’s not yelling into the mic over & over while playing with his friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: The amp is falty
customer_reviews.text: I'm 4 months in to owning this headset. Its been great for the most part with plugging it in to the amp. Muting and unmuting yourself causes an annoying loud beeping noise when plugged in to the amp. I like the amp because it saves my controller battery life having my headset in the amp and not the controller. The amp has recently not been turning on and I've had to use the controller to play. Still a comfortable headset either way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update through computer before hooking up!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about getting this but being a fan of turtle beach I pulled the trigger and ITS AMAZING! All the bad reviews I read made me not want to get this saying it’s not loud enough and all that, update it when you first open it, even turtle beach says that. With the streaming plug in it works better for the Xbox into The elgato. Still need the chat link cable but don’t have to plug it into the controller. It’s partly wireless yet wired.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: THE LAST HEADSET YOU WILL NEEE TO BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is crystal clear and the location of those sounds is amazing ... better than the Astro A40 ... if you like playing battle royale (Blackout, PubG, fortnite) this is the best headset ... there is also an app that you can fine tune your headset by instantly , you can easily download it to your laptop, phone, tablet, or desktop and it allows you to update the firmware when updates become available... amazing headset!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Annoying App & Wires
customer_reviews.text: Initial Review after 2 nights of use: Good part: The sound! It's very clear and powerfull. 75% on the amp was plenty. Mic and chat was clear. Much better sound than my last pair (Turtle Beach XO One). The headset is pretty comfortable, a little heavier than expected. Bad parts: 1. Cables - long and become tangled. Only an annoyance. 2. turtle beach audio app for android- it worked for me (unlike others I've read about), but it's not ideal. I'm a turtle beach fan and I'm not regretting this purchase (@ $100 off retail), but I wonder if I would have been happier with wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This headset is beast!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is beast! Not too loud not to soft. Mic is great too. Noise reduction is really good my friends say this sound quality is crisp and clear. The amp on this headset is just an option to boost sound but imo you dont really need it. You can just plug the headset on you controller and youre all set. Design is also really cool and comfy. I cant really complain about these headsets. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rico

customer_reviews.title: Best headset I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are great, the fit just right and are super comfortable. I’ve gamed for over 10 hours straight and didn’t have any issues with them being uncomfortable. The sound on them is awesome as well. I could hear a lot better then I could on my old headset. I have not tried the Bluetooth part out but that is a cool function to have if I want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, awful microphone
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was really good. However the microphone would pick up the sound coming from the headphones. Build quality is excellent. The amp was nice but the volume was too low in some games I played. I would have kept this headset but had to return because of the game volume returning to the microphone. It was too annoying for my teammates, even after moving the boom away from the headset. I exchanged these for a pair of Sennheiser’s. Much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT BAD NO GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good headset. NEG: To keep this short: you have to always click the Bluetooth button to sink to app. Jumping into party chat there is an echo until I use the app to slide between game and player chats. Mic also picks up sound from headset if you have audio loud. You have to switch sound to Super Human and that helps player chat echo. I bought this on discount so I cannot complain. Overall it’s nice and a good beginning streaming mic. It’s nice audio play back and control for stream. Not the best gaming mic. You might want the Pro our tournament for noise canceling.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Broke where the speaker portion spins after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Headphone broke on both sides after about 18 months. I didn’t expect that on a $250 pair of headphones that I don’t use too often and only set on my tv stand. Tried superglue. Broke again. Tried plastic welding them (I repair broken bumpers daily so it’s easy for me) and they broke after 1 day. Now I have a useless headset. I’m pretty sure I’m switching to Astro A50 or A40.
customer_reviews.author: Sigurd Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Worked intermittently from the beginning then stopped altogether. No customer support
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April of 2020. Ever since it arrived I’ve been putting up with the superamps sensitivity to touch. The slightest tap would cause the unit to stop working and I would have to reset it for it to function again. I should have returned it immediately but I did not. Recently it just stopped working completely. Powers on but no audio etc. Tried to contact turtle beach but they have no phone support at all! Sent email with no response. Unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Give it another chance y’all it’s way better now
customer_reviews.text: I know this headset got a bad rep at first for its volume. There’s been a firmware update though and it’s SO much better. When I got it I was like “oh this is what everyone was talking about” but it wasn’t too bad. Then the next week there was an update and now I actually have to turn down the volume a bit. Totally recommend this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Matte spohn

customer_reviews.title: It's too quiet when you get it, just update the firmware.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return it after two days due to it being too quiet. Before that, I decided to download the Mac app and update the firmware. It's instantly became 50-70% louder and increased the range of tweaks I can make, I can't even play on max volume anymore. Just update the firmware like they told us to do.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Bad interface
customer_reviews.text: Good 3D sound. But having an app as a control hub is inconvenient for the price point. It doesn’t prevent iPhone locking even with game mode feature and requires Bluetooth. So when I walk away from the headphones I have to disconnect the Bluetooth or I can’t hear sound on my iPhone . Also the mic is too sensitive to breathing and annoys everyone and myself when chatting.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Difficulty getting this plug and play to work. Mine has red circle and no Bluetooth can find the headphones. Tried multiple phones, PC and tablets to no avail. Getting this to work is turning out to be rather difficult. Going to put this on list of my made in China disasters.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, comfort and ideas behind the adjustable Bluetooth controls. Easy to setup and get the hang of. Loaded up MW and started playing, but it didn’t sound near as good as my old headset.. played with the Bluetooth controls for a good 5mins and just couldn’t get the sound I wanted. Virtually no bass (even with bass boost selected) and everything sounded bland. I play on Xbox so I just connected back the old turtle beach connector to the back of my controller and hooked up the elite pro 2 into it (bypassing the Bluetooth module). Sounds great now!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Don't hook up to ur phone!
customer_reviews.text: It says you can use these with a phone so my son hooked them up to his and it fried his phone it was a week old and the kind that the battery doesn't come out so we were out 200$ cuz of these headphones plus they only worked for a few hours then just just stopped I returned them waste of my time
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great audio system. I bought Astro A40's (2017 model) and compared the two. Although the Astro's are slightly more comfortable and look a little cooler, these Turtle Beach Elite Pro 2's win in every other category. They sound better, my voice sounds MUCH clearer to those listening on the other end, and the amp has some awesome bluetooth features that allow you to answer phone calls, play music and make sound adjustments. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cherie Hayes

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had better for cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t nearly as loud enough and sound quality wasn’t all that great either. Definitely not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Look else where
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money this headset costs it is utter garbage. Sound cuts in and out and often times just stop completely, no matter how many time I reset it it always happens. Not to mention the mic quality is garbage, I have had multiple people tell me it sounds horrible. Would be better off buying something far less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! The headphones out of the box sound mediocre at best! They require you to use a mobile app called turtle beach audio hub in order to get the most out of the headset. The audio hub app is constantly broken. If you still feel like its worth a shot and want to buy them, before you do, go look at the ratings in your app store "turtle beach audio hub" also return policy states you will only receive 50%. Dont make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: david a.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy
customer_reviews.text: First off the brackets that attach your headband to your ear pieces crack very easily, only took 2 months for me to have to start super glueing them back together. Secondly after 7 months of putting up with the low quality of sound the right ear suddenly stops working. I thought it was the audio cable so i purchased a new one. WRONG. The right ear speaker just completely disconnected and stopped working. So if anyone who is a gamer knows of any better headsets out there please feel free to inform me. I have dealt with turtle beaches for to long and would like something new
customer_reviews.author: Logan Prior

customer_reviews.title: Factory faulty product
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was terrible especially when on Dolby atmos. Tried to do a firmware update, but the drivers would not install. After an hour of research, downloaded drivers from Turtle Beach website and installed update. (This took 4 attempts) Sound was marginally better on regular settings but still awful on Dolby atmos setting. Then the Xbox live chat stopped working after the update. Had enough and sent this product back. I will continue to use my old Turtle Beach XP 510.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an good product, it’s definitely not the greatest sound but I like the fact that they come with the volume adjuster. And easy to replace parts should anything break. Overall the sound is good but if you looking to hear people across the map I’d go for something else.
customer_reviews.author: John Knight

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Beach ELite Pro 1 is better !!!
customer_reviews.text: The A.M.P is all done on your phone. Its a hassle . I had to sync it multiple times to my phone. You cant use this with the ps4 anytime you want big con imo. I pc , xbox one , 360 , ps4 and I play them all . I could only use for xbox and it was such a hassle that I never got it to install on my windows 8 pc. The audio quality is decent but NOT BETTER than the ELITE PRO 1 . I bought another elite pro 1 its that much better.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lamb

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, if you plan on using the mobile app and bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The app is so bad and barely ever connects, or just locks up your phone. The headset itself works well and has great 3d audio but the rest causes nothing but anger on how something could be so bad in 2020
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hisband’s new favorite headset
customer_reviews.text: We went through 3 different pairs of headsets until he fell in love with these. My husband raves about the quality of Turtle Beach and these have been his absolute fav pair since he’s been playing xbox. They look very sleek as well.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Nino

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Terrible static from them at all times despite trying numerous things to fix. You are better off with a basic xbox mic than this thing
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Party Chat Echo
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly clear and loud sound. However, it seemed that other people could hear themselves echoing when I was in party chat, even after lowering the volume. None of Microsoft’s suggested fixes helped either. Extremely disappointing given my love for Turtle Beach
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cook

customer_reviews.title: Built nicely but expensive for the experience
customer_reviews.text: 1st Impressions: Looks great and feels amazing. The headset is built great. The super amp is okay nothing special. Once i started using the headset I noticed it is super quiet. I saw reviews and noticed you need to update it but you can't without a computer. This is an expensive unit for not having Surround Sound. I would go with the Astros 40 for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset is pretty great. The Turtle beach software and App is not however. It is constantly disconnecting from my phone, however, the ease of use and sound quality are huge benefits to owning this. I previously owned the Elite 800 and struggled with wireless issues, since this isn't wireless, I was a bit concerned it would be annoying, but I actually find it very easy to use and not a bother.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all! Volume was so low could barely hear and would not turn up no matter what I tried. Updated on website and still nothing! Worst headset I've ever purchased! DO NOT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Must Fix There App to Get What Your Paying
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. The headset can not be adjusted without the app for max performance. The app is currently not working for it. Its not worth the price of it without the app. The app is called "Audio Hub". Download and checkout the reviews before buying it. Hopefully it has been fixed by the time your looking at this. With the app working it is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kurk

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Headset!
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. Only issue was the cord was very hard to keep straight without it twisting and curling. The benefit of the removable microphone was very convenient and it was very high quality. Audio quality was one of the best you can find. If you are looking for a great wired headset this is one I would recommend because of quality at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: James Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, greats quality. Hear everything while your playing, but not your wife yelling at you. Bluetooth to phone awesome, talk to text depending on your phone, think android only. Down side its corded, upside no charging or batteries. I wear glasses and they are comfortable. Equalizer is on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: michael allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: This headset was a definite upgrade from my previous set. Sound is superb and has plenty of features to customize your experience. Only draw back was I found them a bit heavy, can imagine a smaller individual would have a harder time dealing with the weight than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent when it
customer_reviews.text: I had excellent sound on the side of the head from that worked but I bought mine used and it had a malfunction on the right year but the sound was superb on the left side
customer_reviews.author: Kasay brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great sound , and works flawlessly with Fortnite on Xbox
customer_reviews.author: Britt Britt

customer_reviews.title: Headset causes feedback echo
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sound great, but the mic is so sensitive that it causes a feedback echo to everyone playing with me and there is no option to adjust mic sensitivity. A headset this expensive shouldn’t have that problem. So instead I can’t turn the volume up more than halfway on the headset to avoid the echo for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: People generally say dont by a refurbished hedset. I dissagree these came in the mail like new. everthing works great and is for sure the best headset ive ever got. i saved over 100$ from buying these refurbished over new. if your looking for a headset these are best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: gavin

customer_reviews.title: Great Audi with TB mix amp!!
customer_reviews.text: Headset is great!! Audio is ridiculous!! If using on Xbox, the turtle beach mix amp plugged into bottom of controller is a must!!!!! Don’t use the mix amp it comes with, get the one for bottom of controller. Don’t listen to the negative comments. Any wired headset greatly benefits from the mix amp.
customer_reviews.author: sherrie krycicki

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, comfortable, very robust
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for whatever you want to use them for: gaming, music, Bluetooth headset for even phone calls. Multi use functionality, plus the mix amp is really nice! This headset is also very comfortable and robust, so it can be long hours with taking wear and tear. Would definitely recommend this headset
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth problems
customer_reviews.text: Have used turtle Beach headsets for a decade now and this one is great, when it works. It disconnects from Bluetooth every 2 minutes or so and reverts to a random preset that has party chat all the way up so you can't even hear game chat at all. Not too impressed
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Forant

customer_reviews.title: It broke in use one month
customer_reviews.text: The sound was not heard from the left in 32 days after buying. Because the warranty for amazon and the manufacturer's warranty were also purchased from Japan, the warranty is not effective (the replacement product can not be sent), so it is one star. It was expensive shopping. It is a pity that I did not sell in Japan and bought it by saying it was a good product.
customer_reviews.author: aya

customer_reviews.title: Headset facts
customer_reviews.text: Works great loud clear sound. But has two wires to hook up one is USB so if ya got a extender hard drive no way to charge controllers. Only draw back I find so far
customer_reviews.author: Monkeyking49

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I Returned my head set. Got a good deal, however the quality of the audio was not worth it. I immediately went back to my Astro A40s. Took a Chance and wanted to change it up. Overall product was just not even close to my current Astro headset.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound but dont like all the wires
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound but i dont like all the wires
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: BROKE FIRST DAY THEY ARRIVED!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work the day I received it. :( getting a new tomorrow amazons costumer support is on point how ever turtle Beach I have wait a few days great🙄. Well let’s hope the other ones won’t break.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wentz

customer_reviews.title: It socks
customer_reviews.text: Worst headset I've ever got the app constantly crashes. The right side just gave out and I i bought it in April I will never buy a turtle beach headset again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Well this headset lasted 6 months, the plastic above the write ear piece has cracked and the ear piece is just dangling. Sound quality was good, decently comfy but did not last long at all. Definitely not worth the money, I have not had a headset last 6 months or less with astro a50s, ps gold or hyperx cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Neininger

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Constantly having to reset due to bad static and either my voice in chat wont work or i cant hear others in chat. Also the sound doesnt go up very loud. I have to put it on the loudest settings just to play the game and still cant hear the simplest sounds most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: DEEZ

customer_reviews.title: Features are just the topper
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of the headphones and mic.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Had astro a40s before this and these turtle beaches are terrible compared to the a40s. Audio quality is very disappointing. If you can afford to spend this kind of money on a headset you would be much better of with a pair of Astros
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: My new daily driver
customer_reviews.text: Very well made no issues and awesome sound quality, these will be my daily driver for at least another 5-10 years
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: GOT SCREWED
customer_reviews.text: Bought this new but as u can tell the box is jacked up and after opening it u can tell this was used not new and its missing the damn mic
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Wow, these are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use these on the Xbox for call of duty. These are the best sounding, most comfortable headphones I've ever had... I've tried Astro A40's, Hyperx's and many others... These are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Winsky

customer_reviews.title: This is the headset for you
customer_reviews.text: Very crisp sound from this headset. Best one I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P.

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Hot Ear Cushions, Good Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: The ear cushions on this headset gets hot that gets irritating after 40 mins to use it. They need to build better quality. The sound is great tho, very clear and boss is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, has great sound. My friends can hear me great. The mobile app it uses is great and easy to use. Best headset I’ve gotten
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and build quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product coming from someone who games daily i would definitely recommend this to anyone who is serious about gaming and looking for a premium headset.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever used
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Christmas. He said, “they are THE BEST headphones” he’s ever used! Shipment was as expected and even though bought “gently used” my son said everything was included and well packaged. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Edmister

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: My Mike keeps dropping out and I getting a static noise no matter what device I plug it into would entirely recommend against buying
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Matthew Landrum

customer_reviews.title: All most perfect
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people are saying the volume is to low or it has terrible sound quality I think this is almost perfect the super amp sometimes has trouble connecting to my phone but otherwise this is a nice headset for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Lawson Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had these less than 2 months and they already have a short in the wire and sound quality is to low. Big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: LATONYA KENDLE

customer_reviews.title: Xbox Elite Pro 2
customer_reviews.text: Love the headset, Arrived on time no complaints, You can use headset with or without Superamp !
customer_reviews.author: Michael Waldon

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Best headset!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several really nice headsets over the years, but this is by far the best headset I've ever used. The padding around the ears is very comfortable! The sound is absolutely incredible!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael vickers

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money sound is horrible compared to cheaper versions
customer_reviews.text: So I have a cheaper version of turtle beaches and they are 100 times better then these things. Not worth the money. I've never given a bad review before but these things look and feel good but the sound is garbage and the amp is trash
customer_reviews.author: Chase Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Hate the wired idea. Less breaks in audio and less crackling than my elite 800 but a lot less convenient. These are more comfortable and seem better quality but they perform very comparable to the elite 800
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Volume really bad
customer_reviews.text: People was 100% right on the reviews, the Volume still too low even with the update. Don’t waste you’re time and money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Probably great will never know
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get to use it, was missing the volume control, damnest thing I’ve ever seen coming from amazon
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best if used with T.A.C.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are a definite upgrade from previous pro version, but the super amp is not good. Recommend using the T.A.C if you have one.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Futral

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Not worth the money one bit. Better to stay with the original Elite pro rather then this one. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Shame on you Turtle Beach.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this headset. Biggest piece of crap ever built by Turtle Beach. I’d trade it in if I could but I’m not giving it back for free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very good anyways
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t own this pair for more than half a year, never threw them or anything like that and the audio is already starting to die on me. Great $200.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Promethazine

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Works great sound wise for a couple of hours. And then you can’t hear teammates in party chat or game chat. Do NOT BUY THIS MIC. IT IS TRASH!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jayy cupp

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound, just don't like that I can't control chat and game volume
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatiple with XBox 1
customer_reviews.text: Will not unmute ! No amount of tech support was able to fix this - so now I have an expensive headset that doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Like the sound. A bit bulky but great sound! Perfect for playing video games!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USED: Elite Pro 2
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, amazing comfort, mic is awesome. Support needs some improvement, I troubleshooted most of my issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

product_meta.title: Turtle Beach Elite Pro 2 + SuperAmp Pro Performance Gaming Audio System for Xbox One
product_meta.description: Style:Xbox OneThe Turtle Beach Elite Pro 2 + Super Amp Pro Performance Gaming Audio System for Xbox One builds on the Elite Pro legacy through collaboration with leading sports teams, including Optic Gaming and Splice, to deliver the next generation of audio performance to today’s top players and hardcore gamers. The Elite Pro 2’s custom tuned 50mm Nano clear over ear speakers deliver championship winning performance, while the noise cancelling Pro Gaming Microphone with Trustee Technology provides crystal clear team chat. Revolutionary Aero fit Ear Cushions –deliver cooling comfort as well as passive noise isolation and deeper bass response. Connected to the groundbreaking Elite Super Amp, the Bluetooth connected, app controlled, audio enhancing, amplified Windows Sonic surround sound supporting gaming controller, this complete audio system offers the competitive advantage to dominate your games. The Elite Pro 2 + Super Amp is covered by an extended two year warranty with priority support.
feature_bullets: Pro Gaming Mic with Truspeak Technology : Ensure your voice is always heard loud and clear with Turtle Beach’s professional quality, noise cancelling mic
Large 50 millimeter Nano clear Speakers : Large, powerful 50 millimeter over ear Nano clear speakers deliver Turtle Beach's signature sports audio tuning
Aero fit Ear Cushions : Revolutionary material technologies combine to keep your ears comfortable and cool while also blocking out external noise and improving bass response
Prospecs Glasses Relief System : Turtle Beach's unique prospects comfort driven design removes pressure on your glasses while you play
Durable Comfort : A sleek metal headband with a suspended pad and swappable memory foam ear cushions ensure unmatched comfort; Microphone: Unidirectional gaming microphone

specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
